channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Appeals court revives lawsuit in fight between 2 tribes over Alabama casino
item.description: A federal appeals court revived a lawsuit filed by one Native American tribe over anotherâ€™s construction of a casino on what they said is sacred land.

item.title: 2 arrested in deadly attack on homeless man sleeping in NYC parking lot
item.description: Two men have been arrested on manslaughter charges in the beating death of a homeless man who was accosted while sleeping in a supermarket parking lot in Brooklyn.

item.title: Appeals court maintains block on Alabama absentee ballot restrictions
item.description: A federal appeals court has ruled that a portion of a new Alabama law limiting help with absentee ballot applications will remain blocked.
